title: Shift
creator: Howey, Hugh
description: In a future less than fifty years away, the world is still as we know it. Time continues to tick by. The truth is that it is ticking away. A powerful few know what lies ahead. They are preparing for it. They are trying to protect us. They are setting us on a path from which we can never return

First Shift: Legacy -- Second Shift: Order -- Third Shift: Pact.-In a future less than fifty years away, the world is still as we know it. Time ticks by. The truth is that it is ticking away. A powerful few knows what lies ahead and are preparing for it. They are trying to protect us. The history of the silo is about to be written
subject: Dystopias -- Fiction
